constantValues: Service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance that is tracked for an individual case
Unique identifier of the SLA KPI Instance.
Type a descriptive name for the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User and Team' adds the 'ownerId' attribute below to the 'SLAKPIInstance' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user or team.
Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) will expire.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the record that this service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance is associated with.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'status_display' is added to the 'SLAKPIInstance' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'status'
arguments.name: status_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) instance. For example, the SLA KPI could be Noncompliant or Succeeded.
Shows the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) success criteria was met.
Enter the date and time when the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI)will go to a warning state.

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.
